star wars expanded universe books i have read

03 March 2007

These are listed in cannonical chronological order. A full list is available here.

Darth Bane: Path of Destruction (2006) Darth Bane: Rule of Two (2008) Saboteur (2001) Cloak of Deception (2001) Shadow Hunter (2001) (Episode I) Rogue Planet (2000) Outbound Flight (2006) The Approaching Storm (2002) (Episode II)

The Clone Wars

Republic Commando: Hard Contact (2004) Shatterpoint (2003) The Cestus Deception (2004) The Hive (2004) Republic Commando: Triple Zero (2006) MedStar I: Battle Surgeon (2004) MedStar II: Jedi Healer (2004) Jedi Trial (2004) Yoda: Dark Renezvous (2004) Labyrinth of Evil (2005) Republic Commando: Order 66 (2008) (Episode III) Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight (2008) Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows (2008) Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader (2005) The Force Unleashed (2008)

Han Solo Trilogy

The Paradise Snare (1997) The Hutt Gambit (1997) Rebel Dawn (1998)

Han Solo Adventures

Han Solo at Star's End (1979) Han Solo's Revenge (1979) Han Solo and the Lost Legacy (1980)

Lando Calrissian Adventures

The Mindharp of Sharu (1983) The Flamewind of Oseon (1983) The StarCave of ThonBoka (1983) Death Star (2007) (Episode IV) Splinter of the Mind's Eye (1978) Allegiance (2007) (Episode V) Luke Skywalker and the Shadows of Mindor (2008) Shadows of the Empire (1996) (Episode VI) The Truce at Bakura (1993) The Courtship of Princess Leia (1994) Tatooine Ghost (2003)

Dark Forces

Soldier for the Empire (1997) Rebel Agent (1998) Jedi Knight (1998)

Thrawn Trilogy

Heir to the Empire (1991) Dark Force Rising (1992) The Last Command (1993)

Callista Ming Saga

Children of the Jedi (1995) Darksaber (1995) Planet of Twilight (1997) I, Jedi (1998)

The Jedi Academy

Jedi Search (1994) Dark Apprentice (1994) Champions of the Force (1994) The Crystal Star (1994)

The Black Fleet Crisis

Before the Storm (1996) Shield of Lies (1996) Tyrant's Test (1996) The New Rebellion (1996)

The Corellian Trillogy

Ambush at Corellia (1995) Assault on Selonia (1995) Showdown at Centerpoint (1995)

The Hand of Thrawn Duology

Specter of the Past (1997) Vision of the Future (1998) Survivor's Quest (2004)

The New Jedi Order

Vector Prime (1999) Dark Tide I: Onslaught (2000) Dark Tide II: Ruin (2000) Agents of Chaos I: Hero's Trial (2000) Agents of Chaos II: Jedi Eclipse (2000) Balance Point (2000) Recovery (2001) Edge of Victory I: Conquest (2001) Edge of Victory II: Rebirth (2001) Emissary of the Void (2001) Star by Star (2001) Dark Journey (2002) Traitor (2002) Destiny's Way (2002) Force Heretic I: Remnant (2003) Force Heretic II: Refugee (2003) Force Heretic III: Reunion (2003) The Final Prophecy (2003) The Unifying Force (2003)

Dark Nest Trilogy

The Joiner King (2005) The Unseen Queen (2005) The Swarm War (2005)

Legacy Of The Force

Betrayal (2006) Bloodlines (2006) Tempest (2006) Exile (2007) Sacrifice (2007) Inferno (2007) Fury (2007) Revelation (2008) Invincible (2008)

Fate Of The Jedi

Outcast (2009) Omen (2009)
